short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch and display the current BTC gas price.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ME Chrome extension focused on delivering real-time sat fee for users to quickly make decision on sat fee per transactions conducting/ed. It will display all 3 sat fee tiers upon click, meanwhile badge is intended to continuously display mempool fees per block
